deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - My Good Brother
deckInfo.description: Covers Level 1 (characters & small words) and Level 2 (phrases) for the Chorus of My Good Brother.

vocabulary.name: qing2yi4
vocabulary.explanation: From '朋友的情誼呀...'. Means 'friendship' or 'affection'.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 歲月 (suìyuè) - years, time

vocabulary.name: sui4yue4
vocabulary.explanation: From '那些歲月...'. Means 'years' or 'time passing'.

vocabulary.name: ji4de
vocabulary.explanation: From '...我們一定會記得'. Means 'to remember'.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 今生 (jīnshēng) - this life

vocabulary.name: jin1sheng1
vocabulary.explanation: From '...我們今生最大的難得'. Means 'this life'.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 難得 (nándé) - rare, hard to come by

vocabulary.name: nan2de2
vocabulary.explanation: From '...今生最大的難得'. Means 'rare' or 'hard to come by'.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 一杯酒 (yī bēi jiǔ) - a glass of wine
conceptGroups.description: Introducing the phrase 一杯酒 (yī bēi jiǔ).

vocabulary.name: yi1bei1jiu3
vocabulary.explanation: From '像一杯酒...'. '一 (yī)' - one; '杯 (bēi)' - cup/glass (measure word); '酒 (jiǔ)' - alcohol/wine.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Word - 老歌 (lǎogē) - old song

vocabulary.name: lao3ge1
vocabulary.explanation: From '...像一首老歌'. '老 (lǎo)' - old; '歌 (gē)' - song.

conceptGroups.description: Reviewing key phrases from the chorus.

vocabulary.name: pengyou_de_qingyi
vocabulary.explanation: From '朋友的情誼呀...'. '朋友 (péngyou)' - friend; '的 (de)' - possessive particle; '情誼 (qíngyì)' - friendship.

vocabulary.name: bi_tian_hai_gao
vocabulary.explanation: From '...比天還高...'. '比 (bǐ)' - than; '天 (tiān)' - sky; '還 (hái)' - still/even; '高 (gāo)' - high/tall.

vocabulary.name: bi_di_hai_liaokuo
vocabulary.explanation: From '...比地還遼闊'. '比 (bǐ)' - than; '地 (dì)' - earth/ground; '還 (hái)' - still/even; '遼闊 (liáokuò)' - vast, extensive.

vocabulary.name: naxie_suiyue
vocabulary.explanation: From '那些歲月...'. '那些 (nàxiē)' - those; '歲月 (suìyuè)' - years/time.

vocabulary.name: women_yiding_hui_jide
vocabulary.explanation: From '...我們一定會記得'. '我們 (wǒmen)' - we; '一定 (yīdìng)' - definitely; '會 (huì)' - will (indicates future); '記得 (jìde)' - remember.

vocabulary.name: jinsheng_zuida_de_nande
vocabulary.englishText: the greatest rarity in this life
vocabulary.explanation: From '...我們今生最大的難得'. '今生 (jīnshēng)' - this life; '最大 (zuìdà)' - biggest/greatest; '的 (de)' - particle; '難得 (nándé)' - rare.

vocabulary.name: xiang_yi_bei_jiu
vocabulary.explanation: From '像一杯酒...'. '像 (xiàng)' - like/resemble; '一杯酒 (yī bēi jiǔ)' - a glass of wine.

vocabulary.name: xiang_yi_shou_laoge
vocabulary.explanation: From '...像一首老歌'. '像 (xiàng)' - like/resemble; '一首 (yī shǒu)' - a (measure word for songs); '老歌 (lǎogē)' - old song.
